rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 15 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:43 PM, 07 July 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Pampanga, Bataan, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Rizal, Cavite and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Tarlac(Ramos, Pura, Gerona, Paniqui) and Nueva Ecija(Nampicuan, Guimba) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
